remarks: An edge of a graph always connects two vertices, analogous to ~ usgraedgrnv .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jan-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
usgpredgvALT.v $e |- V = ( 1st ` G ) $.
usgpredgvALT.e $e |- E = ( Edges ` G ) $.
usgpredgvALT $p |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ { M , N } e. E ) -> ( M e. V /\ N e. V ) ) $.
